{{ardayearheader|82|91|95|120|121|171|185}}
==March==
* '''1''' - Death of King [[Aragorn|Elessar]] of the [[Reunited Kingdom]] of [[Gondor]] and [[Arnor]]. [[Eldarion]], son of Elessar and [[Arwen]], becomes King.<ref name="Later">{{App|Later}}</ref>

==Later==
* It is said that the beds of [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Meriadoc]] and [[Peregrin Took|Peregrin]] were set beside the bed of the great king.<ref name="Later"/>
* [[Legolas]] builds a grey ship in [[Ithilien]], and with [[Gimli]] sails down [[Anduin]] and so over [[Belegaer|Sea]]. This marks the end in [[Middle-earth]] of the [[Fellowship of the Ring]].<ref name="Later"/>

==Other version of the legendarium==
In the second edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', the date of [[Aragorn|Aragorn's]] death was ultimately changed by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] from {{FoA|100}} (as in the first edition) to {{FoA|120}}.<ref>{{PM|Shadow}}, Note 7, pp. 419-20</ref>

==Note==
The family tree of the [[House of Durin]] in [[Appendix A]] also gives this year as "{{TA|3141|n}}" of the [[Third Age]].
